title: Storytelling-Based Organizational Culture Innovation Strategy

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Understanding of Organizational Management Concepts
context.additional_context: Practice-Centered Program for Enhancing Organizational Culture Improvement Capabilities Among Science Field Practitioners

learning_goals: Students can create storyboards based on real cases to concretize organizational culture change scenarios
Students can present three or more change management strategies applying storytelling techniques through peer feedback
Students can explain organizational value internalization plans by integrating them with narratives during team project presentations

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
